activity.text:
I would like to work on this issue.

Proposed solution:
- Add a "default option selection" toggle or checkbox so that creators can pick a choice while adding options. 
- If none is set, the question renders without pre-selection.
- Respondents can always change the default.

ETA: 1 day

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12634
activity.text:
@sainak @Jacobjeevan @rithviknishad 

I’ve checked and debugged this issue. The frontend is correctly passing the note value when a new allergy is added, but it's not being returned in the backend response.

Turns out the note field is missing in the backend class handling this, which is likely causing the issue.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ef7bd903-a7eb-4a1a-b49f-64e536efc3c8)

Since I’ve already spent quite some time debugging and confirming this, I’d like to work on fixing it from the backend side if that’s okay. Please let me know.
